text: Yihowah go di God Koia e Aamua ga helekai, “Goodou go digau Israel, Au ga hagau adu dagu buini dauwa mai i tenua i daha gaa noho i di godou henua, gaa dagi goodou hagahuaidu mai i di ala nnoonua go Hamath dela i bahi i ngeia, gaa hana loo gaa tugi i tama monowai i Arabah dela i bahi i ngaaga.”
